ACTIVITY.TITLE: Activity
ACTIVITY.SUBTITLE: How A Cisco Device Locates And Loads IOS

STEP.DESCRIPTION:
Cisco devices go through a four step process to locate and load IOS software.
Place the steps in the process in the correct order.
Remember that if the device finds an IOS at any step in the process, the process is stopped and the IOS is loaded.

ACTIVITY.MESSAGE:
Congratulations, this activity has
been successfully completed.
